resources.string: No valid session found, please login.
Syncing is now done. Your contact pictures should have been updated.\n\nWould you like to post a message about this app on Facebook? (You will get to choose what you want to write)
This application works in three steps:

Press the button above which will take you to the Facebook login. Enter your details and press login. This will show you which permissions this app needs. This app will not post anything on your wall or keep any of your information.

Next this app will show you a list of all your friends and their facebook profile picture. If there is a match to a name in your contacts, it will show you the current contact picture to the right. This view will also show which entries will be synced. Press any friend for more options. When you are done, press the "Sync Pictures"-button.
Lastly you will be shown the pictures as they are syncing. During this process the app will replace the current contact picture with that person\'s Facebook profile picture.
No friends linked with contacts (do a Smart Match to automatically attempt to pair contacts and Facebook friends)
Do you want to save your current links between facebook friends and contacts?
I synced my Android contact pictures with Contact Picture Sync!
Try to find a larger picture
